attributes.action: create a ruling that if products are tested on animals it must be clearly labelled on the product it self, and the same if the product is not tested on animals, so the consumer knows what he/she are buying and are given the choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I myself am against testing on animals, but being a student can't afford to always buy from places such as body shop but i am sure there are are many other companys that have similar values, therefore i think and others would like it if products are clearly labelled showing whether they have experimented upon animals or not, giving people the choice and more insight into what they are actually buying into, and as a direct result could slowly minimise the testing on animals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
